Interface IReportController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReportController
public interface IReportController
Interface defining the contract for generating and formatting reports for the BTO housing system.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Report
    generateReport(String reportType, FilterCriteria criteria, List<Project> projects)
    Generates a report based on the provided report type, filter criteria, and projects.
    List<Report>
    getAllReports()
    Returns all reports in the system.
    String
    getFormattedReport(Report report)
    Formats a report into a human-readable string format.

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      Report generateReport(String reportType, FilterCriteria criteria, List<Project> projects)
      Generates a report based on the provided report type, filter criteria, and projects.
      Parameters:
      reportType - The type/title of the report
      criteria - The filter criteria to apply to the report
      projects - The list of projects to include in the report
      Returns:
      A Report object containing the filtered bookings

    • getFormattedReport

      String getFormattedReport(Report report)
      Formats a report into a human-readable string format.
      Parameters:
      report - The report to format
      Returns:
      A formatted string representation of the report

    • getAllReports

      List<Report> getAllReports()
      Returns all reports in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of Report objects
